response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premier product, which I believe could significantly enhance your business operations and contribute to substantial growth. Given its unique features and capabilities, I estimate its intrinsic value to be well above $1,200,000. However, to facilitate a transaction that benefits both parties, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $1,500,000. This offer includes a comprehensive warranty and personalized support to ensure seamless integration into your existing systems. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if there's any way I can assist you in making an informed decision.", "product_price": 1500000}
